alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Shoshone, Lava Beds; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 14 at 1:42PM MDT until June 14 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 8 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 32 will result in frost formation. For the Wind Advisory, west winds 30 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...The entire Snake River plain, the eastern Magic Valley, the Arco Desert, Mud Lake area, Shoshone area, and the Lava Beds. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, from 1 AM to 8 AM MDT Wednesday. For the Wind Advisory, until 9 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Unsecured objects may be blown around. Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Shoshone, Lava Beds; Upper Snake River Plain
